title: Courgette and lemon drizzle cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '200g grated courgette', '125g butter, melted', '150g caster sugar', '1 egg, beaten', 'juice of 1/2 lemon', '200g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon mix bicarbonate of soda and baking powder', 'For the drizzle', 'juice of 1/2 lemon', '25g caster sugar']
